**Enhance frontend UX (Bootstrap, alerts, improved layout)**

Description
-----------
Improve the current static frontend UX with Bootstrap components, toast/alert feedback (e.g., SweetAlert2), and a responsive layout similar to `liversity`.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Integrate Bootstrap (CSS + JS) and update templates/pages for responsive layout.
- Use toast or modal alerts for signup success/failure.
- Update navigation/header/footer layout and activity cards to match improved design.

Labels: frontend, ux
Estimate: small
